Module de.cuioss.java.tools
Package de.cuioss.tools.lang

Class SecuritySupport

java.lang.Object
de.cuioss.tools.lang.SecuritySupport
@Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="1.2") public class SecuritySupport extends Object
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
SecurityManager hard deprecated by Java 18+
Helper class providing some convenience method for interacting with SecurityManager related stuff. In essence, it uses AccessController.doPrivileged(PrivilegedAction) for its method in case a SecurityManager is set.
Author:
Oliver Wolff

    • getDeclaredConstructor

      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:

      paramTypes - to be used for identifying the constructor
      Returns:
      the found constructor.
      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException - to be thrown, if there is no corresponding constructor
